QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(v.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, v.visit_type, v.visit_start_date, v.visit_end_date, v.visit_start_time, v.visit_end_time, v.discharge_disposition, v.admission_source, e.encid, ec.provid, row_number() over (partition by v.visitid order by e.interaction_date, e.interaction_time) as ordinal, row_number() over (partition by e.encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role, specialty) sort_index from {sc}.visit v join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND v.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.encounter e on v.visitid = e.visitid left join {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid left join {sc}.provider p on p.provid = ec.provid where e.encid is not null and e.encid != '' order by 1
